nodes.bodyText: Not sure why this was on the clientthread before, both these events are always on the client thread
All of the script ids should just be added to ScriptID

nodes.bodyText: I had thought that Adam meant to leave these empty but he meant to leave them undocumented. I have since updated them and made the script names to be more consistent with other script names used in the class.
